column4: Hello, Anyone know how to obtain the su password?  I do not remember assigning a different password other than the one I use for logging in and for the update manager for Ubuntu 8.10.
I get an error stating 'dpkg --cofigure -a' needs to be run manually.
Hello, Anyone know how to obtain the su password?  I do not remember assigning a different password other than the one I use for logging in and for the update manager for Ubuntu 8.10.
